original_statement: As someone who’s Cherokee and Christian, I believe immigration policy should be rooted in fairness, compassion, and an honest reckoning with the fact that my own people were here long before borders like this existed. At the same time, we need strong labor and safety standards so immigrants and citizens alike aren’t pitted against each other, but can thrive side by side.
